name: Into the Noodle Labyrinth
description:
Help Mr. Meatball get to the end of randomly generating labyrinths while defeating evil spaghetti snakes.

Controls:

WASD- Move

Left click- Shoot sauce

Made in about 4 days for Weekly Game Jam 156 with the theme: "Noodle". If you could play the game and leave some feedback, it would mean a lot to me. I'm definitely going to expand on this game more so expect to see updates in the future!
